pullRequest.title: NMS-12228: document additional expandable event parameters
pullRequest.bodyText:
All Contributors

 Have you read and followed our Contribution Guidelines?
 Have you made an issue in the OpenNMS issue tracker?If so, you should:

update the title of this PR to be of the format: ${JIRA-ISSUE-NUMBER}: subject of pull request
update the JIRA link at the bottom of this comment to refer to the real issue number
prefix your commit messages with the issue number, if possible


 Have you made a comment in that issue which points back to this PR?
 Have you updated the JIRA link at the bottom of this comment to link to your issue?
 If this is a new or updated feature, is there documentation for the new behavior?
 If this is new code, are there unit and/or integration tests?
 If this PR targets a foundation-* branch, does it avoid changing files in $OPENNMS_HOME/etc/?

Enhanced documentation for expandable event parameters.
External References

JIRA (Issue Tracker): http://issues.opennms.org/browse/NMS-12228

commit.message: NMS-12228 : document additional expandable event parameters.

NMS-12228: Apply suggestions from code review

Co-Authored-By: Jesse White <jwhite08@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                The trouble ticket id associated with the event, if available.
          
          
            
                The trouble ticket id associated with the event if available.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -123,9 +138,25 @@ Not all events will have values for all tokens, and some refer specifically to i
     The operator instructions for the event.
 `%mouseovertext%`::
     The mouse over text for the event.
+`%tticketid%`::
+    The trouble ticket id associated with the event, if available.

nodes.bodyText: Having the comma is better (but optional), but since most of the other instances of "if available" do not use the comma, I removed this one to be consistent with the other ones, rather than correcting the ones that didn't have a comma. :-)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -123,9 +138,25 @@ Not all events will have values for all tokens, and some refer specifically to i
     The operator instructions for the event.
 `%mouseovertext%`::
     The mouse over text for the event.
+`%tticketid%`::
+    The trouble ticket id associated with the event, if available.
